name: Remove Multiple Prompts
description: Remove one or more prompts from the system by their IDs
template:
Remove the following prompts from the system:

Prompt IDs to remove: {prompt_ids}
Reason: {reason}

Instructions:
- Remove each specified prompt ID from the system
- Confirm successful removal of each prompt
- Provide a summary of removed prompts
- Handle errors gracefully if any prompt doesn't exist

Output should include:
- List of successfully removed prompts
- List of any prompts that couldn't be removed (with reasons)
- Total count of removed prompts

prompt_ids.description: List of prompt IDs to remove
